name: mcp-calculator-service
description: A comprehensive mathematical calculation toolkit for MCP clients with specialized tools for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division operations
long_description: This extension provides a complete set of mathematical calculation tools through a Python MCP server. It includes specialized functions for basic arithmetic operations with detailed formatting and error handling, making it perfect for mathematical computations in AI workflows.

tools.name: add
tools.description: Add two numbers together with detailed formatting

tools.name: subtract
tools.description: Subtract one number from another with detailed formatting

tools.name: multiply
tools.description: Multiply two numbers together with detailed formatting

tools.name: divide
tools.description: Divide one number by another with error handling for division by zero
